articles.author: Laura Hurley
articles.title: America's Got Talent: Watch Simon Cowell Make A Teen Performer's Dream Come True With A Golden Buzzer - CinemaBlend
articles.description: Simon Cowell's "good feeling" about her talent was on the money!
articles.content:
Spoilers ahead for the June 14 episode of America's Got Talent Season 17.
